Package game.model

Class Mover

java.lang.Object
game.model.Mover
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMover
public class Mover
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMover
Moves the single Tiles in the given Direction moveTiles is the Main function. An existing Matrix has to be given.

      public boolean moveTiles​(Directions direction)
      Moves any Tile of the Whole Matrix in the given direction
      Specified by:
      moveTiles in interface IMover
      Parameters:
      direction - Must be specified to clarify in which direction the Matrix should get moved
      Returns:
      Return whether the operation has been successful of not

    • nextToTile

      public boolean nextToTile​(Directions direction, int line, int column)
      Specified by:
      nextToTile in interface IMover
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction which is going to be checked.
      line - The line of the current Tile which is being checked to be next to one another.
      column - The column of the current Tile which is being checked to be next to one another.

    • mergeTiles

      private int mergeTiles​(int lineFirst, int columnFirst, int lineSecond, int columnSecond)
      Parameters:
      lineFirst - The line of the Tile which is going to get bigger.
      columnFirst - The Column of the Tile which is going to get bigger.
      lineSecond - The line of the Tile which is getting "deleted"/merged into the other one.
      columnSecond - The column of the Tile which is getting "deleted"/merged into the other one.

    • advance

      private void advance​(Directions direction, int line, int column)
      Parameters:
      direction - In which direction the Tile is moved.
      line - The line of the current Tile which is to be moved.
      column - The column of the current Tile which is to be moved.
